name: Redemption (itch) (Brian Nielsen, satellitecore)
description:
Might wanna turn down the volume before you click start.

Submission for the https://itch.io/jam/maine-video-game-devs-holiday-jam hosted the Maine Video Games Dev meetup group

CREDITS

Aaron Plasket: Title Screen/Game Music, Game/Menu Sounds, Design Consultant

Brian Nielsen: Lead, Unity fella

Elizabeth Darragh(elsewence): Title Screen Art, Poster Art, Title Screen Buttons, Brand Art

Shane Oliver(mcsneezy): Live Recorded Sound Effects, Sticky note art, Level End Menu Buttons

Troy Kallis: Bin Models, Table Model, Small and Large Can Models, Glass and Plastic Bottle Models (really all the models/things that aren't flat).
